answers.answer: Hi there. Well, at 13, you really need to work with your parents/guardians on this.  We can tell you things here but until you are an adult, it is really up to your parents to do the shopping and make sure you have foods that will help you lose weight if that is what your doctor wants you to do.  Your doctor is also a great source of tips for this.  Other than that, lean protein and vegis/fruits is the way to go.  Cut back on carbs such as pasta, bread, potatoes, white rice and stick to a cleaner diet of the proteins that are lean and any vegi/fruit you want.  Drink lots of water and exercise.  make it a lifestyle change rather than a diet.  Because restrictive diets almost always end up in initial weight loss quickly followed by gaining the weight back PLUS more pounds than where you started.But you do really need to talk to your parents.  good luck

. cut out all sugary drink, and replace it with water, and  green tea. try and drink at least 3 liters of water a day. mix 2tbl spoons of Apple cider vinegar with one cup of water when you wake up and b4 bed! it helps fight Cancer, diabetes, pimples, and maintain weight loss. Ect., plus 15 other thing .
Check with your mom before drinking apple cider vinegar/water mixtures.  For some that is too acidic and causes digestive problems and you should do it with parental supervision.  good luck
